content.text: 3/4 cup cake flour
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3/4 cup cake flour" )

content.text: 3/4 cup all-purpose flour
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "3/4 cup all-purpose flour" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon white sugar
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 teaspoon white sugar" )

content.text: 1/2 teaspoon salt
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1/2 teaspoon salt" )

content.text: 1/8 teaspoon baking powder
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1/8 teaspoon baking powder" )

content.text: 4 tablespoons unsalted butter
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "4 tablespoons unsalted butter" )

content.text: 5 tablespoons shortening
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "5 tablespoons shortening" )

content.text: 1 egg yolk
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1 egg yolk" )

content.text: 2 teaspoons distilled white vinegar
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "2 teaspoons distilled white vinegar" )

content.text: 3 cubes  ice
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "3 cubes  ice" )

content.text: 1/2 cup cold water
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1/2 cup cold water" )

content.text: 0) Measure butter and shortening onto a plate, put into freezer for about 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Measure"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "butter"@11:17 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "shortening"@22:32 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a plate"@38:45 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "put"@47:50 / AC
		:gol ( tool-0-1 "freezer"@56:63 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-0-0 "20 minutes"@74:84 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Measure cake flour, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt and baking powder into the bowl of a food processor.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Measure"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "cake flour"@11:21 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "all-purpose flour"@23:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@42:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@49:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "baking powder"@58:71 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-1-0 "the bowl of a food processor"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Pulse for a few seconds to mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Pulse"@3:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "a few seconds"@13:26 / DUR )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to mix"@27:33 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Take 1/2 of the cold butter and 1/2 of the cold shortening, put into processor with dry ingredients and pulse off and on for about 1 minute.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Take"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "1/2 of the cold butter"@8:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "1/2 of the cold shortening"@35:61 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-1 "put"@63:66 / AC
		:gol ( tool-3-0 "processor"@72:81 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "dry ingredients"@87:102 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-3-2 "pulse"@107:112 / AC
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "1 minute"@134:142 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Scrape down twice while doing this.
5) Take remainder of the cold butter and cold shortening and cut in very briefly with the processor, leaving visible pea-sized chunks.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Take"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "remainder of the cold butter"@8:36 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "cold shortening"@41:56 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cut in"@61:67 / AC
		:heat ( tool-5-0 "the processor"@86:99 / TOOL )
		:simultaneous ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "leaving"@101:108 / AC
		:ppt ( "visible pea-sized chunks"@109:133 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) In a measuring cup, mix egg yolk and vinegar together, add ice cubes and water.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "mix"@23:26 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a measuring cup"@6:21 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "egg yolk"@27:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "vinegar"@40:47 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "add"@58:61 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "ice cubes"@62:71 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "water"@76:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Let this get chilled, about 3 to 4 minutes.
8) Remove mixed flours and shortening from processor, put into a large mixing bowl.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "mixed flours"@10:22 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "shortening"@27:37 / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-8-0 "processor"@43:52 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "put"@54:57 / AC
		:gol ( tool-8-1 "a large mixing bowl"@63:82 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 9) Sprinkle approximately 4 to 5 tablespoons of this egg, water, vinegar mixture, a little at a time, mixing gently with a fork.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Sprinkle"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( "4 to 5 tablespoons of this egg"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "water"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "vinegar mixture"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "mixing"@-1:-1 / AC
		:heat ( tool-9-0 "a fork"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) The key to this is, you do not want a wet dough, and you do not want to overmix.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( "you do not want a wet dough"@-1:-1 / TODO )
	:inform ( "you do not want to overmix"@-1:-1 / TODO )
)

content.text: 11) Place this dough into plastic wrap or plastic bag, chill in refrigerator for a few minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-11 / R
	:inform ( ac-11-0 "Place"@4:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "this dough"@10:20 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "or"@-1:-1 / CHOICE
			:option ( tool-11-0 "plastic wrap"@26:38 / TOOL )
			:option ( tool-11-1 "plastic bag"@42:53 / TOOL )
		)
	)
	:inform ( ac-11-1 "chill"@55:60 / AC
		:loc ( tool-11-2 "refrigerator"@64:76 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-11-0 "a few minutes"@81:94 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 12) Remove from refrigerator and roll out.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "Remove"@4:10 / AC
		:source ( tool-12-0 "refrigerator"@16:28 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-12-1 "roll out"@33:41 / AC )
)
